mapper.select: select podt_code , fn_get_code_name(podt_code) as codeName from product where fn_get_code_name(podt_code) like '%' || #{podtCode} || '%' order by podt_code ASC
select podt_code , podt_lot, (sum(podt_input)-sum(podt_output)) as qnt from product_qnt_info group by podt_code , podt_lot

select pqi.podt_code , fn_get_code_name(pqi.podt_code) as podtName , to_char(pqi.man_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as manDate2 , pqi.com_code , mc.man_plan_no , mp.ord_code from product_qnt_info pqi join manufacture_command mc on pqi.com_code = mc.com_code join manufacture_plan mp on mc.man_plan_no = mp.man_plan_no where pqi.com_code = #{comCode}
select code , code_name from common_code where group_code = 'podt'
